title: Council Regulation (EC) No 540/96 of 25 March 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 3010/95 totally or partially suspending the customs duties applicable to certain products falling within Chapters 1 to 24 and Chapter 27 of the Combined Nomenclature originating in Malta and Turkey (1995)
header:
29.3.1996 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 79/8
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 540/96
of 25 March 1996
amending Regulation (EC) No 3010/95 totally or partially suspending the customs duties applicable to certain products falling within Chapters 1 to 24 and Chapter 27 of the Combined Nomenclature originating in Malta and Turkey (1995)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1995, except for Annex II, which shall apply from 31 December 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1996.
For the Council
The President
S. AGNELLI
(1)  OJ No L 314, 28. 12. 1995, p. 1.
